markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Marid Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2612) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Undine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=314" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 119 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You channel the magic of [marids](/Monsters.aspx?ID=215). You can cast [_hydraulic push_](/Spells.aspx?ID=154) and [_obscuring mist_](/Spells.aspx?ID=210) each once per day as 2nd-level arcane innate spells.
name: Marid Magic
